s: This little pole saw works great. I thought I would need a larger chain saw for some the larger branches but this cut through up to 6" limbs fairly easily as long as you let the saw do the work and don't try to force it.

Amazon.com: Customer reviews: TrimmerPlus PS720 8-Inch Pole Saw with Bar and Chain
s: Very good saw for the money. I have about 1 hour worth of usage on the saw (~75 cuts) and am pleased with the performance for the cost. I own a Stihl KM 90 power head and I have been looking for a matching (used) Stihl pole saw for years. With no luck, i decided to try this product.
